summary: Despicable Me 4 is an animated comedy movie that came out in 2024. It's about Gru, a former supervillain who is now a secret agent, and his family. They move to a new safe house, but Gru's old enemy wants revenge. The movie also shows Gru's family adjusting to their new life and his teenage neighbor wanting to be a villain like him. Meanwhile, some of Gru's Minions become superheroes. The film received mixed reviews and made a lot of money at the box office.
title: Despicable Me 4
